long_description:
Both the scale and offset can be changed. The scale sets the size
of one section. The full window is 12 times the scale. The offset and scale
setting will be rounded up to the nearest available setting by the DS1074Z.

If 'query_set' is set to query the trigger settings will be queried and
left unchanged.

Requires a CONNECTION_DS1074Z node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible DS1000Z oscilloscopes
short_description: The VERTICAL_AXIS_DS1074Z node changes the vertical axis for the DS1074Z.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DS1074Z node).

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Which channel to set or query.

returns.description: Summary of the vertical axis settings.
